header.text3: I am a pasionate game developer, specialized in Unity and C#. At the moment, I am expanding my skills exploring Unreal Engine and, furthermore, I am learning self-taught front-end web developement, using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

about.paragraph1: Hi! I am Pere Albertí Aguiló, a passionate game developer and interactive environments enthusiast. My fascination with this world began in my childhood when I got my first console, the Gameboy Advance.
about.paragraph2: I have always followed a path of exploration and expanding of my creativity, starting from my youth taking drawing and illustration classes until completing a higher degree in 3D animation, games, and interactive environments.
about.paragraph3: After completing my studies, I have continued enriching my skills through collaborations, internships, and personal projects. Additionally, I have discovered a new interest and appeal in web development, using code as a tool to express my creativity.
about.paragraph4: The following are the technologies and skills that I use and am familiar with:
